remarks: Finite commutative sums in a product structure are taken componentwise. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 9-Jun-2019.)
statement:
prdsgsum.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ ( x e. I |-> R ) ) $.
prdsgsum.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
prdsgsum.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` Y ) $.
prdsgsum.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
prdsgsum.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. W ) $.
prdsgsum.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. X ) $.
prdsgsum.r $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> R e. CMnd ) $.
prdsgsum.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. I /\ y e. J ) ) -> U e. B ) $.
prdsgsum.w $e |- ( ph -> ( y e. J |-> ( x e. I |-> U ) ) finSupp .0. ) $.
prdsgsum $p |- ( ph -> ( Y gsum ( y e. J |-> ( x e. I |-> U ) ) ) = ( x e. I |-> ( R gsum ( y e. J |-> U ) ) ) ) $.
$d I x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d ph x y $.
